name: Golden State Ducks SF Power Soccer Program
description: The Golden State Ducks SF Power Soccer program is presented by SF Recreation and BORP Adaptive Sports and Recreation. This program welcomes beginner and experienced players. Power Soccer is a disability sport, played in specially modified power wheelchairs. If you do not have your own power soccer chair, they may be able to provide a chair for you to use to help you get started. And if you want to keep playing, we can help connect you with resources for purchasing your own chair! After you regis

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
